tweets.text: Yay canoeing! Who‚Äôs taking responsibility? @EnvAgency @BritishCanoeing https://t.co/KoJLBTQTm6

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va
Please ask your friends to follow and retweet #stopthestink posts so we can get trending. We need urgent help here. Thank you üòä ü§ûüçÄ https://t.co/W41ojr0zri
Bluebell Wood is looking magical ‚ú® üòÆ  #LoveKeele https://t.co/G7lmWQR4Db

Shame on you @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA It‚Äôs not getting better! Residents of Staffordshire village launch fightback against a landfill https://t.co/cQ4CnRZz7f via @MailOnline #StopTheStink

@EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA this is bloody ridiculous we have a full on gas onslaught again tonight from @WalleysL got serious heart palpitations again & a blinding headache. Do you care? Do you bugger üò°. Happy Mayday as it won't be for us. #StopTheStink @Cap_it_off

tweets.text: @TonyJuniper @pow_rebecca @EmmaHowardBoyd please don‚Äôt allow the Lower Otter Project to become another example of awful habitat destruction - another laughing stock. Really, where is @NaturalEngland  &  @EnvAgency these days, and their leadership? Delay until after nesting! https://t.co/UIFWOQoE7N

@SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA It is unbelievable. I could accept it if they admitted mistakes had been made and offered to work with the community. But no. They don‚Äôt care. @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg #StopTheStink #WalleysQuarry

@SianieRoo @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @PHE_EoEngland I live at top end of Pepper Street which is officially Keele & have woken to the stink in my house several times over the past year. It‚Äôs regularly stinks outside in the garden so I can‚Äôt open the windows.
@WiseBirding @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder Staggering how this is happening on a weekly basis...what the hell are the authorities doing ?
@WiseBirding @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder They‚Äôre adamant it‚Äôs going ahead. I‚Äôm very disappointed and feel we‚Äôve been duped by them.
Utterly insane - DO THE RIGHT THING @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice https://t.co/1ZCBEVwYK2

urls.title: Community Planning Alliance: grassroots map - Google My Maps
urls.description: Map showing 442 grassroots campaign groups fighting developments, roads, environmentally damaging projects. Interim website of the Community Planning Alliance contains links so that you can sign up to emails from us OR add your campaign to the map: https://grassrootscampaigns.weebly.com/ NOTES: * Pink counties are in government's Oxford-Cambridge growth 'Arc' * Pink stars in the North Sea show active national consultations or campaigns * See blog about the map written after first campaigns signed up: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/grassroot-campaigns-stronger-together-rosie-pearson/ Get in touch via Twitter @RosieP4

The map has passed 400. Extraordinary & depressing to see the number of threats to our environment @BorisJohnson @RobertJenrick @MPGeorgeEustice 
 
To add a campaign, click link in the map description. https://t.co/ZMX49Gd03L

Sign up to emails by clicking green pin in N Sea

@WiseBirding @MElcoate @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder Truly sickening, this absolutely should not be happening in breeding season. Contact local politicians: get them to visit site - it's election week. Need to protest and try to block this.  They find loopholes in the W&CAct to get away with it. They are the real criminals though.

This has to stop.

https://t.co/R1BkJMkHBq @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA #StopTheStink

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.
